verses.name: 1 Kings 6:3
verses.text: And the porch before the temple of the house, twenty cubits was the length thereof, according to the breadth of the house; and ten cubits was the breadth thereof before the house.

verses.name: 1 Kings 6:4
verses.text: And for the house he made windows of narrow lights.

verses.name: 1 Kings 6:5
verses.text: And against the wall of the house he built chambers round about, against the walls of the house round about, both of the temple and of the oracle: and he made chambers round about:
